title: Com Hem - Wikipedia
snippet: Founded in 1983 as Televerket Kabel-TV as part of the former state-owned Televerket, the company was successively named Svenska Kabel-TV AB and Telia InfoMedia TeleVision AB, before becoming 'Com Hem' (a play on the Swedish phrase Kom hem, "come home") in 1999.

title: Hem - 2025 Company Profile, Team, Funding & Competitors - Tracxn
snippet: Hem is an acquired company based in Stockholm (Sweden), founded in 2014 by Jason Goldberg and Petrus Palmer. It operates as an Internet-first brand of multi-category home improvement products.

title: Design brand Hem sold to private investment company
snippet: He added: "It has been a privilege ... success‎." The Artek deal brought Vitra a back catalogue of products designed by Alvar Aalto, the Finnish modernist architect who co-founded the brand with his wife in 1935...

title: Hem furniture brand founder Petrus Palmér lists his Stockholm home - The Spaces
snippet: This blacksmith’s workshop turned home in Stockholm is 90 sq m of cool Scandi minimalism – just what you’d expect from the founder of furniture brand Hem, Petrus Palmér.

title: Com Hem
snippet: EQT III acquired Com Hem AB, a Swedish cable TV operator, in 2003.
